Releasing Not Pure Poole v0.1.0

1 Oct 2020 • Songzi Vong

The Jekyll theme Not Pure Poole v0.1.0 was released!

Not Pure Poole is a simple, beautiful, and powerful Jekyll theme for blogs. It is built on Poole and Pure.

For more information about this theme, you can read the README file.
